name: ddns-updater
description: DDNS-Updater is a dockerized dynamic DNS updater that works with many providers. It has a simple web UI for configuration, handles IPv4/IPv6, and is easy to deploy alongside other self-hosted services.
features: Web UI Configuration: Simple interface for managing DDNS settings. No config file editing.
IPv4 & IPv6 Support: Handle both IP versions seamlessly. Future-proof solution.
Docker-Native: Designed for containerized environments. Easy deployment alongside services.
Multiple Providers: Support for numerous DDNS services. Flexible provider choice.
Status Monitoring: Track update success and failures. Full visibility into operations.
Self-Hosted: Run your own DDNS updater. Complete control over domain updates.
